official-title.#text:
To reverse the Department of the Interior’s listing of the lesser prairie chicken as a threatened
			 species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973, to prevent further
			 consideration of listing of such species as a threatened species or
			 endangered species under that Act pending implementation of the Western
			 Association of Fish and Wildlife Agencies’ Lesser Prairie-Chicken
			 Range-Wide Conservation Plan and other conservation measures, and for
			 other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Lesser Prairie Chicken Voluntary Recovery Act of 2014
